languages.text: "Хотя..." {n}Маражай словно что-то припоминает, и на его лице появляется выражение удовлетворения.{/n} "Забудь. На самом деле... это лишь подтверждение того, какой спектакль нас ожидает".
"Although..." {n}Marazhai seems to recall something, and a look of satisfaction appears on his face.{/n} "Forget it. In fact, this is just a confirmation of what kind of spectacle awaits us."
languages.original_text: "Хотя..." {n}Маражай словно что-то припоминает, и на его лице появляется выражение удовлетворения.{/n} "Забудь. На самом деле... это лишь подтверждение того, какой спектакль нас ожидает".

traits.locale_text: "Although..." {n}Marazhai seems to recall something, and a look of satisfaction appears on his face.{/n} "Forget it. In fact, this is just a confirmation of what kind of spectacle is waiting ahead."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Although..." {n}Marazhai seems to recall something, and a look of satisfaction appears on his face.{/n} "Forget it. In fact, this is just a confirmation of what kind of spectacle is waiting ahead."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Although..." {n}Marazhai seems to recall something, and a look of satisfaction appears on his face.{/n} "Forget it. In fact, this is just a confirmation of what kind of spectacle awaits us."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Although..." {n}Marazhai seems to recall something, and a look of satisfaction appears on his face.{/n} "Forget it. In fact, this is just a confirmation of what kind of spectacle awaits us."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Although..." {n}Marazhai seems to recall something, and a look of satisfaction appears on his face.{/n} "Forget it. In fact, this is just a confirmation of what kind of spectacle awaits us."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Obwohl ..." {n}Marazhai scheint sich an etwas zu erinnern, und ein Ausdruck der Zufriedenheit erscheint auf seinem Gesicht.{/n} "Vergesst es. Eigentlich ist das nur eine Bestätigung, welche Art von Spektakel uns erwartet."
languages.original_text: "Although..." {n}Marazhai seems to recall something, and a look of satisfaction appears on his face.{/n} "Forget it. In fact, this is just a confirmation of what kind of spectacle awaits us."

traits.locale_text: "Obwohl ..." {n}Marazhai scheint sich an etwas zu erinnern, und ein Ausdruck der Zufriedenheit erscheint auf seinem Gesicht.{/n} "Vergesst es. Eigentlich ist das nur eine Bestätigung, welche Art von Spektakel uns erwartet."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “不过……”{n}玛拉斋似乎想起了什么，脸上露出满意的表情。{/n}“先不提了。老实说，这仅仅证实了我的猜想，我大概知道会是什么在等着我们了。”
languages.original_text: "Although..." {n}Marazhai seems to recall something, and a look of satisfaction appears on his face.{/n} "Forget it. In fact, this is just a confirmation of what kind of spectacle awaits us."

traits.locale_text: “不过……”{n}玛拉斋似乎想起了什么，脸上露出满意的表情。{/n}“先不提了。老实说，这仅仅证实了我的猜想，我大概知道会是什么在等着我们了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Cela dit... {n}Marazhai semble se souvenir de quelque chose et un air satisfait éclot sur son visage.{/n} Oubliez ce que j'ai dit. En fait, ce n'est qu'une confirmation du genre de spectacle qui nous attend. »
languages.original_text: "Although..." {n}Marazhai seems to recall something, and a look of satisfaction appears on his face.{/n} "Forget it. In fact, this is just a confirmation of what kind of spectacle awaits us."

traits.locale_text: « Cela dit... {n}Marazhai semble se souvenir de quelque chose et un air satisfait éclot sur son visage.{/n} « Oubliez ce que j'ai dit. En fait, ce n'est qu'une confirmation du genre de spectacle qui nous attend. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Aunque...». {n}Marazhai parece recordar algo y su mirada se vuelve satisfecha.{/n} «Olvídalo. Es más, esto solo confirma la clase de espectáculo que nos espera».
languages.original_text: "Although..." {n}Marazhai seems to recall something, and a look of satisfaction appears on his face.{/n} "Forget it. In fact, this is just a confirmation of what kind of spectacle awaits us."

traits.locale_text: «Aunque...». {n}Marazhai parece recordar algo y su mirada se vuelve satisfecha.{/n} «Olvídalo. Es más, esto solo confirma la clase de espectáculo que nos espera».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「だが…」{n}何かを思い出したようなマラズハイは、満足げな表情を浮かべた。{/n}「忘れてくれ。ただどんなお楽しみが俺たちを待ち受けているのかの確認に過ぎん」
languages.original_text: "Although..." {n}Marazhai seems to recall something, and a look of satisfaction appears on his face.{/n} "Forget it. In fact, this is just a confirmation of what kind of spectacle awaits us."

traits.locale_text: 「だが…」{n}何かを思い出したようなマラズハイは、満足げな表情を浮かべた。{/n}「忘れてくれ。ただどんなお楽しみが俺たちを待ち受けているのかの確認に過ぎん」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Hoş..." {n}Bir şey hatırlamışa benzeyen Marazhai'ın yüzünde bir tatminkârlık ifadesi beliriyor.{/n} "Unut gitsin. Bunlar, bizi ne kadar muazzam bir gösterinin beklediğinin ispatı sayılır."
languages.original_text: "Although..." {n}Marazhai seems to recall something, and a look of satisfaction appears on his face.{/n} "Forget it. In fact, this is just a confirmation of what kind of spectacle awaits us."

traits.locale_text: "Hoş..." {n}Marazha bir şey hatırlamış gibi görünüyor ve yüzüne tatmin olmuş bir ifade yerleşiyor.{/n} "Unut gitsin. Bizi ne kadar muazzam bir gösterinin beklediğinin ispatı sayılır bunlar."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
